title: Is it possible to undo front cam facial retouching after the picture was taken?
content: I had facial retouching turned off on my phone but somehow it got turned back on and I had already taken a bunch of pictures (which look worse with retouching - why that's a default setting I will never know).  Is that a filter that can be removed after the fact?  For the life of me, I can't find anything in the phone/camera on that or in these forums.
